pages.text: $(item)采石包$()可以存储大量的$(thing)石块$()。$(p)$(item)耐用采石包$()可以存储大量的$(thing)碎石头$()。

pages.title: In the World
pages.text: $(info) 当放置在世界中时，背包可以使用$(use)来打开和关闭。$(p)$(info) 背包打开时，你可以手动取出和存放物品。$(p)$(info) 物品可以在底部被提取（如漏斗）。

pages.title: In Your Inventory
pages.text: $(info) To open or close a bag while holding it, ensure you are not targeting a block and $(sneak) + $(use).$(p)$(info) If you have an open bag in your hand or hotbar, it will auto-collect items you pick up.$(p)$(info) Auto-collected items will fill existing stacks in your inventory before filling a bag.

$(info) Items in a bag can be transferred to an inventory, like a chest, with $(sneak) + $(use).$(p)$(info) If you $(sneak) + $(use) an open bag on a non-inventory block, the contents of the bag will spill into the world.
